channel.itunes:author: Christopher Bell, Caleb Sour
channel.description: Two dudes from New Orleans discuss the world from their own perspectives.

channel.itunes:subtitle: Two dudes discuss the world

item.title: Episode 1 - Bourgeois Spectacles
item.description: The guys discuss Jeremy’s recent appearance to defend gamers on the news, XXXTentacion’s tragic death and the subsequent social media backlash, Austin’s Bourgeois spectacles, what makes mass murderers and more
item.itunes:summary: The guys discuss Jeremy’s recent appearance to defend gamers on the news, XXXTentacion’s tragic death and the subsequent social media backlash, Austin’s Bourgeois spectacles, what makes mass murderers and more
item.itunes:subtitle: Bourgeios trash?
